item.title: Collaborative Filtering
item.description: UserCF UserCF uses ratings of the target item from top N similar users to predict the rating from the current user. There are mainly two steps: Steps 1. Calculate similarities between users. There are three common ways of calculating user similarities: a. Jaccard Similarity: $$J_{u,v} = \frac{|N(u) \cap N(v)|}{|N(u) \cup N(v)|}$$ $N(u)$ denotes the interacted item set of user $u$. b. Cosine Similarity: $$cos(u,v) = \frac{u\cdot v}{|u|\cdot|v|}$$ $u$ and $v$ denote the rating vectors of two users respectively.
